summary: Three men from a provincial town are in urgent need of money and decide to buy a lottery ticket. They win the lottery, but soon after their ticket gets stolen.
cast: Dorian Boguta|Dragos Bucur|Alexandru Papadopol|Andi Vasluianu|Serban Pavlu|Mircea Banu|Elisa Calin|Nora Cupcencu|Ioana Florentina Dimitriu|Elias Ferkin|Ligia Matei|Codin Maticiuc|Alexandru-Victor Nemteanu|Dragos Niamtu|Irina Noaptes|Codrina Patru|Popescu Tina
keywords: cell phone|eastern europe|lottery|lottery ticket|lost lottery ticket
title: Doua lozuri
